document.title: Fact Book: 2011-2012

author.organization: The Office of Institutional Research and Assessment

document.abstract:
Welcome to the 2011-2012 edition of the Fact Book for the University of Tennessee, Knoxville.

Our online Fact Book is made available to provide official information about the university including student demographics, enrollment, graduation data, faculty and staff demographics, financial data, and facilities. The 2011-2012 Fact Book data reflect inclusive figures for the University of Tennessee, Knoxville, the Institute of Agriculture, and the Space Institute. Past yearsâ€™ presentations of the Fact Book reflect figures for the programs in Knoxville, Memphis, and Tullahoma, as well as the Institute for Public Service and the Institute of Agriculture. We are pleased to make this rich source of university information available and hope you will find it useful. If you need information not found in the Fact Book, please contact the Office of Institutional Research and Assessment at (865) 974-4373, oira@utk.edu, or 915 Volunteer Boulevard, 2538 Dunford Hall, Knoxville, TN 37996-4060.
